trans-unit.source: Provides programmatic access to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_webParts" name="webParts" href=""></xref> configuration file section.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso programático para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_webParts" name="webParts" href=""> </xref> seção do arquivo de configuração.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The `webParts` configuration file section allows you to specify a Web Parts personalization provider, set personalization authorizations, and add custom classes that extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> class for use by Web Parts connections.
trans-unit.target: O `webParts` seção do arquivo de configuração permite que você especificar um provedor de personalização de Web Parts, definir autorizações de personalização e adicionar classes personalizadas que estendem o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>classe para uso por conexões de Web Parts.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection"></xref> class using default settings.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection"> </xref> classe usando as configurações padrão.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartsSection constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: O construtor WebPartsSection não se destina a ser usado diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: Ele é chamado pelo sistema de configuração do ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Obter uma instância de <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection>classe usando o <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>método.</xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor não se destina a ser usado diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: Ele é chamado pelo sistema de configuração do ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the default settings that are used for this constructor.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra as configurações padrão que são usadas para esse construtor.

trans-unit.source: |Setting|Default Value| |-------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection.Personalization%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalization> object.| |<xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection.Transformers%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfoCollection> collection containing a default <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> object.|
trans-unit.target: | Configuração | Valor padrão | |-------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection.Personalization%2A>| Um objeto <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalization>vazio. | | <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection.Transformers%2A>| Um <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfoCollection>coleção que contém um padrão <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo>objeto. |</xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfoCollection> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection.Transformers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection.Personalization%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable the export of control data to an XML description file.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deseja habilitar a exportação de dados de controle para um arquivo de descrição de XML.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable the export of control data to an XML description file; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para habilitar a exportação de dados de controle para um arquivo de descrição XML; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalization"></xref> object that allows you to specify the Web Parts personalization provider and set Web Parts personalization authorizations.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalization"> </xref> objeto que permite que você especifique o provedor de personalização de Web Parts e defina autorizações de personalização de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalization"></xref> object that allows you to specify the personalization provider and set personalization authorizations.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalization"> </xref> objeto que permite que você especifique o provedor de personalização e defina autorizações de personalização.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> objects specify custom classes that extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> class for use by Web Part connections for the ASP.NET applications affected by the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo>objetos especificam classes personalizadas que estendem o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>classe para uso de conexões de Web Part para os aplicativos ASP.NET afetados pelo arquivo de configuração.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer></xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo>

trans-unit.source: These transformer classes act as bridges between connected Web Parts, translating data between Web Parts with incompatible connection points.
trans-unit.target: Essas classes de transformador atuam como pontes entre Web Parts conectadas, transferir dados entre as Web Parts com pontos de conexão incompatível.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfoCollection"></xref> collection of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfoCollection"> </xref> coleção de <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"> </xref> objetos.
